meaning_str.bing:
n. 档案；文件夹；锉；锉刀
v. 把（文件等）归档；提起（诉讼）；提出（申请）；送交（备案）
网络. 文件名；文件菜单；案卷

把（文件等）归档；提起（诉讼）；提出（申请）；送交（备案）

（计算机的）文件；档案；锉；锉刀；纵列；行列；档案资料；记录册；资料夹；电子文件；文档；排成一行的人（或物）
存档；归档；提起（诉讼）；发送（报告、消息等）；锉平；整理；塑形；排成一列行进；鱼贯而行；报送（新闻）；按顺序排列；送交（备案）

1.en: You'd have to make sure to bring the file with you, email it to yourself, or save it in a place you could get to it later.
1.cn: 你得保证文件带在身边，或通过电邮发送给你自己，或存放在以后你可以访问的某个地方。

2.en: The next three bits (shown in blue) represent your right to read, write, and execute the file, respectively.
2.cn: 接下来的三位（用蓝色表示的）分别表示您对该文件的读、写和执行权限。

3.en: Given the sensitive nature of the information in the keystore, even placing it on a shared network accessible file system is inadvisable.
3.cn: 考虑到密钥存储库中信息的敏感性，即使将它放在可通过网络访问的共享文件系统中，也是不妥当的。

0.en: The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file. They say it's from the leaders of the Autobots.
0.cn: 联合国刚刚收到一份加密音频文件，说是来自汽车人的领导者。

1.en: Well, that doesn't make a difference. No, all you have to do is file the campaign papers. You don't have to actually run.
1.cn: 那也没差别。不，你只需递交参选的文件，不用真的参加竞选。

2.en: I've scoured every single data file on Commander Lewis personal drive. This is officially the least disco song she owns.
2.cn: 我把路易斯指挥官个人硬盘的每一个文件都翻了一遍，这真真儿是她最不迪斯科的歌了。

3.en: I have to check your file. Excuse me.

4.en: Now Caseys aren't wealthy, they don't wanna file suit.
4.cn: 肖恩家里条件不是很好，他们也不打算提出诉讼。

5.en: Splendid. Clawhauser will give you the complete case file.
5.cn: 很好，爪豪斯会把完整的案宗给你。

6.en: File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.
6.cn: 资料说他们自愿参加斯特拉克的试验，真是疯了。

7.en: I don't want to look at your file. This is over.

8.en: You don't have to decide now. If you look at our file.
8.cn: 不必马上决定，请看看我们的档案。

9.en: This is an extra copy to have on file. You know, just in case.
9.cn: 这是用来存档的另一个副本，你知道的，以防万一。

10.en: If you two don't want to be together you'll have to file for divorce.
10.cn: 如果你们不想在一起，就必须办理离婚。

11.en: Ooh, what did I do with my file-a-facts? I must've left it in conference room B.
11.cn: 我的名片夹到哪儿去了？一定是忘在B会议室了。

12.en: I need to get my job back! Okay. We'll file a discrimination suit against the NSA.
12.cn: 我得回到原来的工作岗位。好吧，我们会起诉国家安全局歧视员工。

13.en: Crime wave in Gotham. Other breaking news: "Water, wet." Did you file the football yet?
13.cn: 哥谭市暗流涌动，另一条爆炸新闻是“水是湿的”，你写好橄榄球赛的稿子了吗？

14.en: Maybe Chase's case file can help clear that up. I'll go down to evidence and take a look.
14.cn: 也许切斯的案件卷宗可以帮我们弄清这一点，我去证物科看看。

15.en: File 82-712. Agent Rick Dicker interrogating. State your name, please. Tony. Tony Rydinger.
15.cn: 档案82-712。里克·迪克特工进行讯问。请说出你的名字。托尼，托尼·莱丁杰。

16.en: Wait, are you saying that he discriminated against you? Because we should file a complaint.
16.cn: 等等，你是说他对你有种族歧视？因为我们应该提出控告。

17.en: Okay, single file, everybody! Choo choo! Everybody find a safety buddy. My safety buddy is Maya.
17.cn: 好了同学们，排成一列，每人找一个安全伙伴，我的安全伙伴是玛雅。

18.en: When you file, I will do just that. Bail is set at $1.3 million, to be posted at a hundred percent.
18.cn: 你申请了我再审，保释金为130万，需全额缴纳。

19.en: Will. Will. We sent every file we're legally required to... You're trying to bleed us out of this case.
19.cn: 威尔，威尔。我们已依法将所有卷宗... 你是故意想让我们没任何材料可用。
